code:
flowchart LR
    %% Define the main sections
    subgraph Setup [Education_ClassroomService]
        direction TB
        A[Education_ContentCDN] --> B[Education_LMS_Portal]
        B --> C[Education_LMS_Portal]
    end
    
    subgraph Acquisition [Education_LMS_Portal]
        direction TB
        D[Education_GradeSync] --> E{Education_ContentCDN}
        E -->|Yes| H[Education_StudentDB]
        E -->|No| F[Education_LMS_Portal]
        F --> H
    end
    
    subgraph Processing [Education_ContentCDN]
        direction TB
        I[Education_ClassroomService] --> J[Education_ClassroomService]
    end
    
    subgraph Analysis [Education_LMS_Portal]
        direction TB
        K[Education_ContentCDN] --> L[Education_LMS_Portal]
        L --> M{Education_StudentDB}
        M -->|Local| N[Education_StudentDB]
        M -->|HPC| O[Education_LMS_Portal]
    end
    
    subgraph Reporting [Education_ClassroomService]
        direction TB
        P[Education_ClassroomService] --> Q[Education_StudentDB]
        P --> R[Education_ClassroomService]
        P --> S[Education_GradeSync]
    end
    
    %% Connect the sections
    Setup --> Acquisition
    Acquisition --> Processing
    Processing --> Analysis
    N --> Reporting
    O --> Reporting
    
    %% Add logo reference (Education_GradeSync)
    classDef logo fill:#fff,stroke:none
    LOGOtext[Education_LMS_Portal]
    class LOGOtext logo
    
    %% Define visual styles
    classDef configNode fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
    classDef scriptNode fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px
    classDef decisionNode fill:#ff9,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px
    classDef outputNode fill:#bfb,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px
    
    class B,C configNode
    class D,F,I,J,K,N,O,P scriptNode
    class E,M decisionNode
    class H,L,Q,R,S outputNode
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
